allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add command mapping table and improve activation instructions for better AI execution

- Add explicit command mapping table at top of SKILL.md
- Use stronger action words \(INSTANT ACTION, EXECUTE IMMEDIATELY\)
- Change agent_id from "my-clawdbot" to "openclaw"
- Improve save token instructions with executable bash commands
- Bump version to 1.0.9

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
